foreignData.flavorText: Dem Hauch des Winters wurde Gestalt verliehen.
foreignData.name: Borealis-Elementar
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
Zaubersprüche, die deine Gegner wirken und die das Borealis-Elementar als Ziel haben, kosten beim Wirken {2} mehr.

foreignData.name: Elemental boreal
foreignData.text:
Vuela.
A tus oponentes les cuesta {2} más lanzar hechizos que hagan objetivo al Elemental boreal.

foreignData.name: Élémental boréal
foreignData.text:
Vol
Les sorts que vos adversaires lancent qui ciblent l'Élémental boréal coûtent {2} de plus à lancer.

foreignData.flavorText: È il respiro dell'inverno che ha preso forma.
foreignData.name: Elementale Boreale
foreignData.text:
Volare
Le magie che i tuoi avversari lanciano e che bersagliano l'Elementale Boreale costano {2} in più per essere lanciate.

foreignData.name: 北方の精霊
foreignData.text:
飛行
対戦相手が北方の精霊を対象として呪文を唱えるためのコストは{2}多くなる。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — エレメンタル

foreignData.name: 북풍 정령
foreignData.text:
비행
당신의 상대들이 북풍 정령을 목표로 발동하는 주문들은 발동하는 데 {2}가 더 든다.

foreignData.flavorText: A materialização do sopro do inverno.
foreignData.name: Elemental Boreal
foreignData.text:
Voar
As mágicas que seus oponentes conjuram com Elemental Boreal como alvo custam {2} a mais para serem conjuradas.

foreignData.name: Полярный Элементаль
foreignData.text:
Полет
Разыгрывание вашими оппонентами заклинаний, целью которых является Полярный Элементаль, стоит на {2} больше.

foreignData.name: 北风元素
foreignData.text:
飞行
对手施放之以北风元素为目标的咒语增加{2}来施放。

foreignData.name: 北風元素
foreignData.text:
飛行
對手施放之以北風元素為目標的咒語增加{2}來施放。

name: Boreal Elemental
originalText:
Flying
Spells your opponents cast that target Boreal Elemental cost {2} more to cast.

rulings.text: To determine the total cost of a spell, start with the mana cost or alternative cost you’re paying, add any cost increases (such as that of Boreal Elemental), then apply any cost reductions. The mana value of the spell remains unchanged, no matter what the total cost to cast it was.
An opponent’s spell that targets Boreal Elemental more than once costs only {2} more to cast.
